scripts.test: npm update && npm run lint && npm run custom-tests && echo 'Done.'
scripts.lint: node ./node_modules/eslint/bin/eslint . --max-warnings=0 && echo 'âœ”  Your code looks good.'
scripts.build-doc: npm install phantomjs && npm install -g wiki2pdf && cd docs && wiki2pdf . --title CAADE --format all --footer ./_footer.html
scripts.deploy: npm run-script deploy-apps && docker stack deploy --compose-file=./deploy/docker-compose-dev.yaml caadeDev
scripts.deploy-test: cd deploy && docker stack deploy --compose-file=./test/docker-compose.yaml caadeTest
scripts.deploy-prod: npm run-script deploy-apps && docker stack deploy --compose-file=./deploy/docker-compose-prod.yaml caade
